Class UserProfile

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
ticktocktrack.gui.UserProfile
public class UserProfile extends javafx.application.Application
UserProfile is a JavaFX Application class responsible for displaying and managing a user's profile interface, including profile image selection and update notification.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javafx.application.Application

  • Field Details

    • imageView

      private javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView
      The ImageView component used to display the user's selected profile image.

    • selectedFile

      private File selectedFile
      The currently selected image file for the user's profile.

    • onProfileUpdated

      private Runnable onProfileUpdated
      A callback Runnable that is executed when the profile has been updated. This can be used to notify other parts of the application about changes.

  • Constructor Details

    • UserProfile

      public UserProfile()
      Default constructor for UserProfile.

    • UserProfile

      public UserProfile(Runnable onProfileUpdated)
      Constructs a UserProfile with a callback that is triggered when the profile is updated.
      Parameters:
      onProfileUpdated - a Runnable callback to execute on profile update

  • Method Details

    • setOnProfileUpdated

      public void setOnProfileUpdated(Runnable callback)
      Sets the callback to be executed when the profile is updated.
      Parameters:
      callback - a Runnable callback to execute on profile update

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      The main entry point for all JavaFX applications. Initializes and shows the primary stage for the user profile UI.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the primary stage for this application

    • chooseImage

      private void chooseImage()
      Opens a file chooser dialog to allow the user to select a profile image. The dialog filters for PNG, JPG, and JPEG image files. Upon selection, the imageView is updated to display the selected image, and the selectedFile reference is updated.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String message)
      Displays an informational alert dialog with the provided message.
      Parameters:
      message - the text message to display in the alert

    • applyHoverEffect

      private void applyHoverEffect(javafx.scene.control.Button button, String baseStyle)
      Applies a hover effect on the specified button by changing its style when the mouse enters and reverts it when the mouse exits.
      Parameters:
      button - the Button to apply the hover effect on
      baseStyle - the base CSS style string to revert to when the mouse exits

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main entry point that launches the JavaFX application.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments (not used)
